claims.claim: AI-powered assistant helps teachers save time while creating high-quality teaching resources
claims.quote: Backed by Microsoft India CSR, Shiksha copilot helps teachers create personalized, high-quality teaching resources while saving time.

claims.claim: The initiative aims to improve learning outcomes and support 1,000 government school teachers
claims.quote: This AI-powered digital assistant is a research project, which is a collaboration between Sikshana Foundation and Microsoft Research India, aims to improve learning outcomes and support 1,000 government school teachers across Karnataka.

claims.claim: The program successfully digitized 4,000 libraries by the end of the year
claims.quote: We, along with support from Dell Technologies are happy to be part of this, as we are on track to digitize 4000 libraries (Arivu Kendra) by the end of the year.

claims.claim: Samyak Prerana program supports 15,000 students across 199 schools in three blocks of Gujarat
claims.quote: It will support 15,000 students of Class IV to VIII in 199 schools spread across three blocks of Gujarat.

claims.claim: Shiksha Co-pilot reduces time for teachers to generate high-quality personalized content
claims.quote: Shiksha Co-pilot is centred around the teachers' needs by focusing on empowering teachers to generate high-quality personalized content while also reducing the time to do this.

claims.claim: The initiative will enhance teaching ability of educators and learning capacity of students
claims.quote: This initiative will enhance the teaching ability of educators and the learning capacity of student

claims.claim: 1,000 teachers will receive training in the initial phase with plans for statewide extension
claims.quote: In its initial phase, 1,000 teachers across the state will receive training on using Shiksha Co-pilot, with plans to extend the project statewide as it progresses.

claims.claim: OMR solution was used to assess nearly 55 lakh students from class 4 through 10 for academic performance
claims.quote: This technology was used for the 2019 and 2020 CSAS where nearly 55 lakhs students from class 4 thru 10, were assessed for academic performance.

claims.claim: Custom OMR solution offers significant cost savings compared to commercial alternatives
claims.quote: Most commercial OMR solutions are very expensive and are also not very child friendly. Sikshana has used SDAPS open-source OMR library and by creating an end-to-end process with supporting python scripts have a developed a solution that can be customized and scaled very easily.
